I have to admit that schools have their advantages, like reputable certification, and PE classes. But this also has its own advantages

The school class room is generally subject to the pecking order and, there is a secret conformity to adhere to the 'cock of the class'. Bullying, shyness, low self esteem, age differences and lack of confidence prevents students asking questions and from understanding the lesson. This approach to teaching breaks down those barriers and lets the fledgling geniuses come out of the cocooned shell of fear. They may not get a 'qualification' but, they'll gain confidence to go forth & enquire further.

congratulations youtube videos are better than lessons because you can pasue and rewind if you struggle too pick something up and watch them as many times as you want

HELL YEAH ! down with the schools, up with the FREE, SHORT, and REPEATABLE instructions. I am a straight A student, not because i'm smart, but because i use the BEST books, and go over the material until it is completely clear. That means pausing and thinking a lot in-between, something you can't do in class. SCHOOL IS AN INEFFICIENT USE OF TIME. School is like giving a random stranger 1000$ to get 10$ back. Exercise your power of choice and learn elsewhere! Stop feeding the monster!

This "disembodied" voice got me through algerbra, and helped suppress anxieties I had towards math so much that I consider taking on others for the challenge.  It was comforting to know if I didn't quite understand something that I could supplement it with these videos.  I recommend them to as many people as I can.
